useCases.title: Use Cases for DOAP File Management

useCase.title: Create a Standard DOAP File for Maintenance by the Project

description.p: A project developer visits the application, selects the option to create a new DOAP and is presented with a form containing fields for project details. They enter these details in the form and are presented with a complete DOAP file that can be stored in the projects document set.

section.title: Justification
section.p: A DOAP file is allows a project to register their project with a number of external applications quickly and easily. Creating an initial DOAP file requires some knowledge of the DOAP format. By providing a form to create a standard DOAP file we make it unnecessary for users to learn the schema, subsequent edits can be done using a standard text editor.
